page.title: 08Industry
page.content: This being a rural area the main industry is farming. There is a small woodworking business in Tilsworth but the main larger industry is the Totternhoe Lime & Stone Co. There have been quarries worked around the foot of the Knolls since approximately 200 BC and lime burning since 1650 AD but as the stone is a clunch it is not suitable for exterior use although it was used at Windsor Castle and Woburn Abbey.The present company employs 31 people and quarries 50,000 tonnes per annum from an area of 56 acres.The spent quarries are reclaimed for agricultural use.Although the lime is mainly used for building, it is also used in water softening processes, water PH control, effluent control, sewage treatment and for agriculture.
